meta.content: KIPP Minnesota is a network of high-performing, college-preparatory public charter schools in Minneapolis. For more details, click here.

img.alt: Enroll - We are united around the same goal: college and a life full of choice. Now enrolling students in grades K-8.

div.p: We are united around the same goal: college and a life full of choice. Now enrolling students in grades K-8.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-stack combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: educate - We have bold goals, so we need incredibly passionate and talented people to help us reach them.

div.p: We have bold goals, so we need incredibly passionate and talented people to help us reach them.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Our Mission - Establish and operate high performing public schools in the Twin Cities that confront educational inequity by delivering academic excellence and cultivating leadership skills to ensure all students succeed in college and life.Learn More

div.p: Establish and operate high performing public schools in the Twin Cities that confront educational inequity by delivering academic excellence and cultivating leadership skills to ensure all students succeed in college and life.
We envision a more just and equitable Minnesota. Education can transform our collective future.

div.h3: alumni working toward college + career goals

p.em: As part of our unique KIPP Through College & Career program, we support students from the time they leave our classrooms to college or career.
We opened a middle school in 2008 in downtown Minneapolis. Since then we have opened an elementary school, with another middle school opening in the fall of 2019.
Were building a community of confident, resilient, and joyful scholars who will be the leaders of tomorrow.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: Our Team - At KIPP Minnesota we look for talented, dedicated, and experienced educators with a hunger to help the next generation of students reach their highest potential.Learn more.

div.p: At KIPP Minnesota we look for talented, dedicated, and experienced educators with a hunger to help the next generation of students reach their highest potential.

div.class: sqs-block video-block sqs-block-video sqs-col-6 span-6 float float-right
div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"As students across the country head back to school, our 109 KIPP schools have just opened their doors to more than 32,000 students, and 1,800 KIPP alumni are bound for college. In the communities we serve, KIPP is creating a direct and positive impact by putting thousands of students on a path to college completion."},"hSize":6,"floatDir":"right","html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/aVHmHHw1irk?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://youtu.be/aVHmHHw1irk","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aVHmHHw1irk/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.p: The Minnesota Department of Education listed KIPP North Star Academy as one of 29 schools on its High-Quality Charter Schools List.The Minneapolis School Finder report prepared this year by Minnesota Comeback includes us on its list of High-Performing schools for the fourth year in a row - the only school in North Minneapolis to get the recognition. KIPP North Star Academy was also recognized as a "Changing The Odds" school for the second consecutive year.

p.em: Every child deserves an excellent education and the opportunity to graduate from college.

strong.em: Your donation to KIPP MN provides the above-and-beyond programming and supports that are central to KIPP students success.

p.em: Thank you for helping our students rise to and through college.
Are you interested in donating your time to KIPP MN? Click the link below to learn more and register for upcoming events.
Connect with us on social media and stay up to date on school news and blog posts!
